channel.title: The Review Show
channel.itunes:subtitle: A weekly review show on current movies and rentals
channel.itunes:author: GoGo Media
channel.itunes:summary: Wondering what to watch this week? Looking for a Friday / Saturday movie? Every week we'll have a refreshing take on whats on in the cinema and whats out to rent.
channel.description: Wondering what to watch this week? Looking for a Friday / Saturday movie? Every week we'll have a refreshing take on whats on in the cinema and whats out to rent.

item.title: Show Number 1 of the Review Show
item.itunes:author: GoGo Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Show Number 1 hosted by Stephen Smith on what to watch
item.itunes:summary: Hello guys & gals!So I've put the new show into this feed just to get it off the ground, its a relatively short episode and just a taster, Steve (your host) hasn't recorded a podcast before so leave comments, help him come out a bit!

item.title: Show Number 2 of the Review Show
item.itunes:author: GoGo Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Steve tells you about 4 films on his mind
item.itunes:summary: Hiya guys and gals, welcome to The Review Show, this week Steve lets you have his two cent on Mamma Mia, The X Files, Wall.e and an oldie!

item.title: Show Number 3 of the (revenge of the) Review Show
item.itunes:author: GoGo Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Steve tells you about 4 films on his mind
item.itunes:summary: Hiya guys and gals, The Review Show is back (finally), This week, Steve reviews The Pink Panther 2, Gran Torino, Slumdog Millionaire and Watchmen
